A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a huge star wars fan\, this movie is bad. The force powers are way way over powered\, (force chocking and slammimg from the other side of the galaxy)\, not inline with the previous movies. Some characters story lines were a waste and they might as well have not been in the movie\,(fin and the code master). Luke Skywalker was a grumpy old man that just moaned through most the movie. The only good parts of the movie are the space battles and the visual looks of all the different scenes and planets.
